item.title: Michael add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Michael add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "We all need to be mocked from time to time, lest we take ourselves too seriously." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Michael add a quote by Peter Charles Melman
item.description: "Do you know about Thor's Hammer? (Points to Bicep) Well, that's it right here." -- Peter Charles Melman

item.title: Michael add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Michael add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Michael add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description:
"Never put off till tomorrow what may be done day after tomorrow just as well".
From: "More Maxims of Mark" -- Mark Twain

item.title: Michael add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Michael add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Not my daughter, you bitch!" -- J.K. Rowling

item.title: Michael add a quote by Groucho Marx
item.description: "Outside of a dog, a book is man's best friend. Inside of a dog it's too dark to read." -- Groucho Marx
